body.name: Soft Bristles Broom Indoor Angle Broom with Long Handle Soft Floor Sweeping Brooms Kitchen Broom

features: The soft bristle broom head is 12" wide.It can sweep a large area at a time.So you can clean in high efficiency and save your time!

The indoor sweeping broom has an angled head which is perfect for getting into corners and under tables and chairs. Ideal for getting into all the narrow spaces ordinary brooms can't reach or may cause damage

The head has soft cleaning brush bristles that can attract dust, dirt and hairs easily. This floor brush indoor works with all types of floors; and the soft tip bristles will not damage or scratch your laminated, wooden or tile flooring.
3-piece interlocking broom handle breaks down for easy storage or custom height adjustment.You can do cleaning easily without bending down.And the hanging hole on the handle is easy for storage.

Made of high-quality stainless steel, the handle of this soft brush broom will give strength and support while cleaning. It also comes in a tubular design so it does not add much weight to the kitchen brush floor broom. The soft broom head bristles are intact, strongly attached and will not easily fall out when cleaning.
body.description: Long Handle Indoor Angle Broom Soft Floor Sweeping Brooms Kitchen Broom Our angle brooms can be used on nearly all flooring surfaces, including wood, linoleum, tile, concrete and cement, for effortless use just about anywhere. To sweep the garages, courtyard, sidewalks, decks and indoor surfaces, home, kitchen, room, office, floor, walks or driveway you need a broom with extra stiffness and durability. Our soft bristle broom is your choice! No bending Sweeping Angle design Broom Head x1,Ron Poles x3

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bristles are a bit stiff and flimsy
reviews.reviewText: The bristles are stiff and flimsy making a bit harder to actually get everything into the dust pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Butter Soft Bristles
reviews.reviewText: After a lot of searching for a soft bristle broom for extensive hardwood floors, I selected this one. It works wonderfully and picks up all sorts of dust and tiny pieces. Very gentle, soft bristles that will not scratch the hardwood floor finish. I would purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom pieces did not fit well. If you pick up the broom to sweep it falls apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Broom!
reviews.reviewText: I know it sounds crazy to love a broom, but I do. Sweeping is a breeze now. The soft bristles don't pick up the dust bunnies like my stiff Liberman broom and throw them around causing me to have to chase after them. This wonderful broom gently pushes all the cat litter, cat fur and dust bunnies into a nice little pile that I can sweep into the dustpan and dispose of -- as it should be. Little of it gets stuck to the bristles, which always drove me crazy with other brooms. I no longer have to pull hair and fuzz off the broom bristles when I'm done sweeping. Hallelujah!One tip: This broom requires a different style of sweeping. Don't go sweeping around with broad strokes like a madwoman. The soft bristles will throw debris everywhere. Just take it easy and use a slow hand. Thinking of *pushing* the debris into a pile instead of sweeping it wildly. You'll be impressed.I'm thinking of buying another for when this one wears out, but it seems sturdy enough to last a while. It is definitely long enough for a tall person too. I'm a shorty and I only used two of the three extension pieces when I put the broom together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024

reviews.reviewText: But I expected more bristles. Kinda thin
